Package com.salesforce.androidsdk.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventsObserver
    Observer of sdk events
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventsListenerQueue
    This tracks activity events using a queue, allowing for tests to wait for certain events to turn up.
    EventsListenerQueue.BlockForEvent  
    EventsObservable
    This allows other classes (primarily test classes) to register & receive events generated by the sdk.
    EventsObservable.Event  
    ForceAppInstrumentationTestCase
    Super class for tests of an application using the Salesforce Mobile SDK
    HybridInstrumentationTestCase
    Super class for tests of hybrid application
    JSTestCase
    Extend this class to run tests written in JavaScript
    JUnitReportTestRunner
    This extends the report runner that generates a standard junit report file, with the timerun cap.
    LogUtil
    Helper methods for logging
    NativeInstrumentationTestCase
    Super class for tests of native application
    TimeLimitedTestRunner
    A TestRunner that limits the lifetime of the test run.
    UriFragmentParser
    This parses a Uri fragment that uses a queryString style foo=bar&bar=foo parameter passing (e.g.
    UserSwitchReceiver
    Listens for the user switch event, and acts on it.
